name: Hex-lines
tagline: Puzzle Game Chrome Packaged App (open-sourced Intern project)
body:
### About Hex-Lines
Hex Lines is a casual game where the goal is to create lines of 5 buttons of the same color. Special buttons act as wildcards, allow you to explode neighboring buttons, or destroy all buttons on the board that match that color.

### History
Hex Lines was developed at Google's Sydney office, Australia under the [BOLD Internship Program](http://www.google.com/intl/en/jobs/bold/). Completed early 2013.

### Authors and Contributors
@laurenmanzo and Yeri Chung did the bulk of development on Hex-Lines during their internship.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
